title: Professional Experience
subtitle: A comprehensive timeline of my career journey and professional growth

experiences.description: Executed slicing of UI design components into high-fidelity, responsive React elements with pixel-perfect accuracy. Integrated APIs and collaborated with backend and design teams to deliver new features that improved performance and user engagement.

Built a session-based login system, implemented a daily in-memory cronjob for KPI ingestion, facilitated sprints as Scrum Master, and coordinated team workflows. Designed analytical dashboards and server-side data querying components to enhance visualization and system efficiency.
Enhanced an existing product by adding payment pages and an automated PDF invoice pipeline. Delivered React + Bootstrap components and integrated backend endpoints to streamline transaction flows.

Resolved data mismatches between IoT devices and the web app using WebSocket and MQTT pub/sub. Built a RESTful API integrated with the Antares platform for realtime communication, and shipped a web-based monitoring interface.

experiences.company: Google Developer Student Club Universitas Negeri Semarang
experiences.description: Organized Info Session, Study Jam, and webinar programs; delivered a Backend Study Jam session; supported joint training with PTI Unnes; and volunteered at GDG Semarang DevFest events.
Supported internal training routines and contributed to programming initiatives across the organization.
Led mechanical design efforts for competition robots, coordinated the team, and oversaw project planning and execution.
Served as a core team member for the Indonesian Robot Contest, contributing to research and mechanical design.
Bachelorâ€™s degree in Informatics Engineering (GPA 3.74/4.00). Relevant coursework: Algorithms & Programming, Operating Systems, Database Systems.
